price: A da hoćemo, Mi bismo ti ih, uistinu, pokazali i ti bi ih, sigurno, po biljezima njihovim poznao. Ali, ti ćeš ih poznati po načinu govora njihova. – A Allah zna postupke vaše.
arabic: وَلَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَأَرَيۡنَٰكَهُمۡ فَلَعَرَفۡتَهُم بِسِيمَٰهُمۡۚ وَلَتَعۡرِفَنَّهُمۡ فِي لَحۡنِ ٱلۡقَوۡلِۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw nashāu la-araynākahum falaʿaraftahum bisīmāhum walataʿrifannahum fī laḥni al-qawli wal-lahu yaʿlamu aʿmālakum
translations: surely, We could show them to you
but surely, you will know them
